xt:extension.xt:author: Sorin Carbunaru
xt:extension.xt:name: PDF Image Rendering

body.p: Contribute libraries to Oxygen which make it possible to render PDF images in the Author page.
For more details, please visit the project location: https://github.com/oxygenxml/oxygen-pdf-image
